content:
Improve this resume bullet:
"**Description:**We are seeking an experienced freelancer or agency proficient in PHP, HTML, CSS, WordPress, Elementor Pro, and WooCommerce to transform our static website into a dynamic, engaging platform. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in coding and customization, with expertise in integrating Elementor Pro and WooCommerce functionalities.**Responsibilities:**- Convert static website pages to dynamic, responsive ones using PHP, HTML, and CSS.- Implement WordPress features for enhanced functionality.- Integrate and optimize Elementor Pro for seamless page building.- Set up and customize WooCommerce to facilitate smooth e-commerce operations.**Requirements:**- Proven experience in PHP, HTML, CSS, WordPress, Elementor Pro, and WooCommerce.- Strong portfolio showcasing dynamic website transformations.- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.- Excellent communication skills for project updates and collaboration.**Budget:**The project budget is $500, with payment upon successful completion of the project within 10 business days.If you are interested please send a brief description of any custom work you have done and the skills that fit with our project.Budget: $500Posted On: February 17, 2024 09:06 UTCCategory: CMS DevelopmentSkills:Elementor,     PHP,     HTML,     CSS,     WordPressSkills:        Elementor,                     PHP,                     HTML,                     CSS,                     WordPressCountry: Canadaclick to apply"

content:
Improve this resume bullet:
"Auto Film Mastery is seeking a talented and experienced Remote Landing Page Developer to join our dynamic team on a project basis. As we continue to expand our online presence, we are looking for a skilled individual who can create captivating landing pages inspired by ClickFunnels to drive conversions and enhance user experience.Responsibilities:Develop highly engaging landing pages inspired by ClickFunnels, adhering to brand guidelines and marketing objectives.Collaborate with the marketing team to understand campaign goals and target audience, and translate them into effective landing page designs.Write compelling and persuasive copy that effectively communicates key messages and drives action.Create visually appealing graphics and images.Proven experience as a Landing Page Developer or similar role, with a strong portfolio showcasing successful landing page designs and results.Exceptional writing skills with the ability to craft compelling copy that drives action and engages users.Strong graphic design skills with experience creating visual assets for web pages.Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a remote, project-based environment, with a keen attention to detail and deadlines.Excellent communication skills , very important.Join our team and be part of our mission. If you are a talented Landing Page Developer with a passion for creating impactful designs and driving conversions, we want to hear from you! Apply now to take the next step with Auto Film Mastery.Budget: $1,000Posted On: February 17, 2024 17:14 UTCCategory: Web DesignSkills:Mockup,     Landing Page,     Graphic DesignSkills:        Mockup,                     Landing Page,                     Graphic DesignLocation Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.Country: United Statesclick to apply"

content:
Improve this resume bullet:
"Job Description:We are looking for a diverse group of female voice actors to record a voice-over for a commercial that will be broadcast on various social media platforms. The commercial is segmented into 4 videos with different lengths (60s, 30s, 15s, and 6s) and will be produced in 4 formats (09:16, 4:5, 1:1, and 16:9), resulting in 16 videos. We aim to cover 48 languages, providing a global reach for our message.Topic: Ads for a renowned sportswear brandProject Details:- Languages Required: Belgian French, Belgian Dutch, Brazilian Portuguese, Bulgarian, Khmer, Canadian French, Canadian English, Chilean Spanish, Simplified Chinese, Colombian Spanish, Croatian, Czech, Arabic (Egypt), Estonian, French, German, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Irish English, Hebrew, Italian, Japanese, Kazakh, Russian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Mexican Spanish, Arabic for Morocco, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Wolof, Serbian, Slovakian, Slovenian, Korean, Spanish, Catalan, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Thai, Turkish, Arabic (Saudi Arabia), Ukrainian, English for the US, Vietnamese.- Length of Videos: 60s, 30s, 15s, and 6s- Video Formats: 09:16, 4:5, 1:1, 16:9- Total Videos: 16- Broadcasting Rights: Must include price with broadcasting rights for social networks.- The maximum deadline is 3-4 days, starting on February 26th.- Deliverables: Videos with the voice-over included (ideally).Requirements:- Female voice actors proficient in the listed languages.- Ability to deliver high-quality voice-over work within a tight deadline.- Must provide a quote that includes broadcasting rights on social media platforms.- Previous experience in voice-over projects, especially in commercials, is preferred.Selection Criteria:1) Quality and clarity of voice samples.2) Competitive pricing and understanding of broadcasting rights.3) Professional experience and timely delivery.Budget:Please provide your quote with your application. We are looking for competitive offers that reflect the scope of the project.Posted On: February 16, 2024 15:57 UTCCategory: Voice TalentSkills:Voice-Over,     Female,     Voice Acting,     Middle-Aged AdultSkills:        Voice-Over,                     Female,                     Voice Acting,                     Middle-Aged AdultCountry: Franceclick to apply"

content:
Improve this resume bullet:
"What does the financial future look like for 2024? The answer is the Annual Forecast Model - Available Now!He is well known for having targeted the stock market crash of 1987 on national television weeks prior to the date and months ahead with the Annual Forecast Model.HISTORYThe AFM has been published since the mid-1980s and the forecast made in 1987 calling to 'watch for that nasty step in October 1987' made market history! In recent years, the AFM correctly pinpointed the advent of the 2000-2003 bear market by stating "It Looks Like an Honest to Goodness Bear Market" on February 1, 2000!As an "Elf" for seven years on 'Wall Street Week with the late Louis Rukeyser' investors across the nation turned their eyes weekly toward Mark Leibovit to provide stock market signals for their investment portfolios. You may have also seen Mr. Leibovit as a regular Market Monitor guest on The Nightly Business Report with the late Paul Kangas for 30 years..Armed with the same Annual Forecast Model, what will your strategy be in 2024?This year the Annual Forecast Model will include the Dow Industrials, Crude Oil, Gold, Copper, Bitcoin, Silver, Lithium, Uranium, U.S. Dollar and Treasury Bonds.The VR Annual Forecast Model, utilizes proprietary cyclical and technical indicators, to provide investors, money managers and traders with an uncannily accurate blueprint of what the market year will look like. Although past performance can be no guarantee of future results, look at the recent models and judge for yourself.Sign up for your own road map to the stock market for 2024.Sign up for  Mark Leibovit's 2024 Annual Forecast Model Report from TIMER DIGEST's #1 Market Timer for 2019. The Annual Forecast Model (The VR Forecaster Report) is published each and every year in early February and updated during the summer.    Don't miss the opportunity to see Mark Leibovit's widely recognized Annual Forecast Report that projects market direction and/or important cyclical change points months in advance. We have called it our 'Blueprint to the Future.' The AFM is unique to Mark Leibovit it has been published since the mid-1980s. Access to the report is provided via the website using the username and password provided to you. Pricing is only $900.00.   Credit cards accepted. THERE ARE ABSOLUTELY NO REFUNDS ON THIS PRODUCT. Clients are urged to keep the VR Forecaster Report confidential, due both to its pricing and in an effort to keep the research from being too widely circulated, possibly then diminishing its effectiveness.Annual$900Hourly Range: $40.00-$90.00Posted On: February 18, 2024 21:29 UTCCategory: Financial Analysis & ModelingSkills:Kindle Direct Publishing,     EnglishSkills:        Kindle Direct Publishing,                     EnglishLocation Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.Country: United Statesclick to apply"
